title: Tewu 01
description: Comprehensive practice test covering Governance, Stakeholder Engagement, and Life Cycle Management.

options.text: How portfolio components will be evaluated in the portfolio
How portfolio components will be categorized in the portfolio
How portfolio components will be selected for inclusion in the portfolio

questions.explanation: The correct answer is D. Refer to Section 3.1 of the Standard for Portfolio Management - 3rd Edition. Review the descriptions and definition.

questions.text: You are currently engaged in working with focus groups and brainstorming activities to develop the portfolio management plan. What best describes what you are doing? (Difficult)
questions.explanation: The correct answer is A. Refer to Section 5.1.2.1 of the Standard for Portfolio Management - 3rd Edition. Review the descriptions and definition.

questions.text: The Authorizing and Controlling Process Group: (Moderate)

options.text: Consists of the processes for determining how to authorize the portfolio
Consists of processes for selecting components to the portfolio
Consists of the processes for determining how to authorize the portfolio and providing ongoing oversight of the portfolio
Consists of the processes for providing ongoing portfolio oversight

questions.explanation: The correct answer is C. Refer to Section 3.1 of the Standard for Portfolio Management - 3rd Edition. Review the descriptions and definition.

questions.text: Ben comes to you for advice. He understands that there is a strategic management process but is unsure of what stage in the process he is in. He is currently doing a strategic alignment analysis. What phase is he in? (Moderate)
questions.explanation: The correct answer is D. Refer to Section 4.1 of the Standard for Portfolio Management - 3rd Edition. Review the descriptions and definition.

questions.text: The development of the Portfolio Strategic Plan process includes the following outputs: (Moderate)
questions.explanation: The correct answer is A. Refer to Section 4.1 of the Standard for Portfolio Management - 3rd Edition. Review the descriptions and definition.

questions.text: How does a portfolio manager address the function of marketing? (Moderate)

options.text: Not a factor as portfolio managers look at multiple areas
Analyzing Market opportunity and competitive advantage

questions.explanation: The correct answer is D. Refer to Section 1.7 of the Standard for Portfolio Management - 3rd Edition. Review the descriptions and definition.

questions.text: The following are all examples of categories that the portfolio component along with its key descriptors can be assigned to except: (Moderate)
questions.explanation: The correct answer is B. Refer to Section 5.2.2.2 of the Standard for Portfolio Management - 3rd Edition. Review the descriptions and definition.

questions.text: Rob has just started working on the Develop Portfolio Risk Management Plan process. He is trying to find information on roles and responsibilities for conducting risk management. Where can Rob find this information? (Moderate)
questions.explanation: The correct answer is A. Roles and responsibilities are defined in the portfolio management plan. Refer to Section 8.1.1.1 of the Standard for Portfolio Management - 3rd Edition. Review the descriptions and definition.

questions.text: You have been asked to complete a portfolio roadmap. What do you need to start the process? (Moderate)

options.text: Portfolio strategic plan, portfolio charter, portfolio management plan
Portfolio process assets, portfolio charter, readiness assessment
Portfolio charter, portfolio, portfolio process assets
Portfolio strategic plan, portfolio charter, portfolio

questions.explanation: The correct answer is D. Refer to Section 4.3 of the Standard for Portfolio Management - 3rd Edition. Review the descriptions and definition.
